verbose_text: Since our SPR data show that GST-AtSPX1 cannot disrupt the MBP-AtdPHR1-DNA interaction but was able to form a protein complex with free MBP-AtdPHR1 in the presence of Pi/InsP6 and prevent MBP-AtdPHR1 from interacting with DNA, we propose that AtSPX1 could modulate the transcriptional regulation of PSI genes by tuning the dynamic equilibrium of the AtPHR1-P1BS interaction (XREF_FIG).
evidence: AtSPX1 could modulate the transcriptional regulation of PSI
